    UsersApi.UserStatusParams
    withGameIds(boolean withGameIds)
    Whether or not to include game IDs in the result
    default UsersApi.UserStatusParams
    withGameMetas()
     
    UsersApi.UserStatusParams
    withGameMetas(boolean withGameMetas)
    Also return the id, time control and variant of the game being played, if any, for each player, in a playing field.
    Defaults to false to preserve server resources.
    Disables withGameIds
    default UsersApi.UserStatusParams
    withSignal()
     
    UsersApi.UserStatusParams
    withSignal(boolean withSignal)
    Also return the network signal of the player, when available.

  • Method Details

    • withGameIds

      UsersApi.UserStatusParams withGameIds(boolean withGameIds)
      Whether or not to include game IDs in the result

    • withGameIds

      default UsersApi.UserStatusParams withGameIds()

    • withSignal

      UsersApi.UserStatusParams withSignal(boolean withSignal)
      Also return the network signal of the player, when available. It ranges from 1 (poor connection, lag > 500ms) to 4 (great connection, lag < 150ms) Defaults to `false` to preserve server resources.

    • withSignal

      default UsersApi.UserStatusParams withSignal()

    • withGameMetas

      UsersApi.UserStatusParams withGameMetas(boolean withGameMetas)
      Also return the id, time control and variant of the game being played, if any, for each player, in a playing field.
      Defaults to false to preserve server resources.
      Disables withGameIds

    • withGameMetas

      default UsersApi.UserStatusParams withGameMetas()
